definitions.body: Jordan (acc. to Rel Ol:§ 215 c, fr. [[ירד]] with [[ן]]—[[ֵ]] for orig. [[ן]]—[[ַ]], cf. LXX o( Iordanhv; = river as flowing downward, descending, then of particular stream as river Kat) e)coxh/n. See also Sta:§ 294 e ([[ן]]—[[ֵ]] for [[ן]]—[[ֶ]], but name acc. to Sta non-Hebr.))—abs. alw. ´[[הַיַָּר]] in prose Ge 13:10 + 162 t.; c. [[ה]] loc. [[הַיַּרְדֵּ֫נׇה]] Ju Jdg 8:4 + 3 t.; [[יַרְדֵּן]] only Ps 42:7, Job 40:23; cstr. [[יַרְדֵּן]] Nu 26:3 + 11 t. Nu Jos + 1Ch 6:63; —the river of Palestine: in all periods, chiefly Hex (122 t.: Ge 5 t. J; Nu 20 t. P, 1 t. JE; De 26 t.; Jos 34 t. JE, 20 t. D, 16 t. P), Ju (12 t.), and S (18 t.); in K 13 t.; Ch 7 t.; elsewh. 10 t.;—[[הַיַּרְדֵּן הַוֶּה]] Ge 32:11 (J), De 3:27, De 31:2, Jos 1:2, Jos 1:11, Jos 4:22 (all D); [[הַיַּרְדֵּן]] Ge 50:10, Ge 50:11 (J), Jos 7:7, Jos 24:8 (both JE), + 20 t. D + Ju Jdg 5:17, Jdg 10:8, 1Sa 31:7; P has also [[מֵעֵבֶר הַיַּרְדֵּן]] Nu 32:19, and [[לַיַּרְדֵּן]] ´[[מֵע]] v:Nu 32:19, v:Nu 32:32, Nu 35:14, Jos 14:3, also Jos 17:5 (JE), Jos 18:7 (D), Ju Jdg 7:25, 1Ch 12:37, 1Ch 26:30; in P peculiarly [[יַרְדֵּן יְרֵחוֹ]] the Jordan of (at) Jericho, with [[עַל]] Nu 26:3, Nu 26:63, Nu 31:12, Nu 33:48, Nu 33:50, Nu 35:1, Nu 36:13, with [[מֵעֵבֶר לְ]] Nu 22:1, Nu 34:15, Jos 13:32, Jos 20:8 (= 1Ch 6:63), with [[מִן]] Jos 16:1 (E?); [[עֵבֶר הַיַּרְדֵּן]] Is 8:23, De 4:49, Jos 13:27 (P); see sub [[עבר]]; [[מֵי הַיַּרְדֵּן]] Jos 3:13, Jos 3:13, Jos 4:18, Jos 4:23 (all JE), Jos 3:8, Jos 5:1 (both D); [[מֵימֵי הַיַּרְדֵּן]] Jos 4:7 (JE); ´[[גְּאוֹן הַיַּר]] Je 12:5, Je 49:19, Je 50:44, Zec 11:3 (v. [[גאון]] p. 145 a, supr.); [[שְׂפַת]] ´[[הַיּר]] 2Ki 2:13; [[יוֹשֵׁב עַל־הַיׇּם וְעַל יַד הַיַּרְדֵּן]] Nu 13:29 (JE; elsewh. in Nu, P); [[כִּכַּר הַיַּרְדֵּן]] the circle of Jordan, i.e. the plain about Jericho Ge 13:10, Ge 13:11 (J), 1Ki 7:46, 2Ch 4:17; ´[[מַעְבְּרוֹת הַיַּר]] Ju Jdg 3:28, Jdg 12:5, Jdg 12:6 fords of the Jordan; [[אֶל־גְּגְּלִילוֹת הַיַּרְדֵּן אֶל־עֵבֶר בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל]] Jos 22:11, cf. v:Jos 22:10 (both P; v. [[גלילות]] supr. p. 165); [[אֶרֶץ יַרְדֵּן]] Ps 42:7 (without art. only here and in foll.); [[יׇגִּיחַיַרְדֵּן אֶל־פִּיהוּ]] Job 40:23 a Jordan bursteth forth into his mouth.
